knownLimitations.description: The @anthropic/mcp-server-thinking package may not exist. If the server fails to start, check npx registry for the correct package name or remove this server.
The github MCP server requires GITHUB_TOKEN environment variable to be set for API access. Ensure the token is available in your environment.
The code-review@anthropics plugin reference assumes the Anthropic plugin marketplace is accessible. If unavailable, the plugin will not load.
